data.eml:eml: Contributions to the taxonomy of Vilga Stål (Hemiptera, Coreidae, Pseudophloeinae) with the description of a new species from southern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Costa, Wanessa Da Silva, Barcellos, Aline (2017): Contributions to the taxonomy of Vilga Stål (Hemiptera, Coreidae, Pseudophloeinae) with the description of a new species from southern Brazil. Zootaxa 4353 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4353.1.11
